programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell plays a hunch in Highland, Calif., while Jarrod and Brandi experience royal pains; Barry follows signs to a potential profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: All's Fair in Storage and Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi look to score in Laguna Niguel, Calif.; Barry cuts the competition to pieces; a new buyer arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Kook, the Chief, His Son, and the Brothers
programme.desc: The buyers encounter fierce competition from "The Kings of Swag" in Lake Elsinore, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi feud; an item has an astronomical price tag.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Orange, Calif.; Ivy Calvin finds collectibles in the garbage; Jarrod and Brandi hope to earn a profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers roll into Compton, Calif.; Jarrod gets a new nickname; Mike purchases a locker that Herb doesn't want; Barry is reunited with his old friend Kenny.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene and Casey take on rival couple Jarrod and Brandi; Darrell wins an intriguing locker after dodging a bullet; Ivy encounters a furry friend.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy searches for high-end lockers; Rene and Casey clash over purchases; things get hairy for Jarrod and Brandi; Darrell plays old-fashioned pranks on his rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Brandon score big when when the buyers return to Moreno Valley, Calif.; Mary Padian looks for romance and attractive units.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers descend upon Riverside, Calif., where Mary hopes to dial up some luck and Brandi tries to stay positive for Jarrod.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave goes after Jarrod and Brandi at a first-class auction in Arcadia, Calif.; Ivy makes an early move; Mary struggles to keep up with the competition amid soaring prices.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell defends his turf when the buyers descend upon Costa Mesa, Calif.; Ivy Calvin comes across a unique tool; Jarrod and Brandi seek store stock.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers gamble on storage units in Las Vegas; Darrell bets on a locker covered with blankets; Barry appraises a sign from the 1940s and makes a new friend.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers battle in Costa Mesa, Calif.; a unit is filled with rock memorabilia; Darrell and Jarrod vie for an antique slide projector.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Ontario, Calif., Jarrod overpays for some toys and Darrell has an encounter with "the Man"; Barry faces his own mortality.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers look for deals in City of Industry, Calif.; Dave makes a profit; Barry visits the "King of Kitsch."

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry and Kenny get fired up; Dave Hester makes a find worth cheering over; Brandi is exhausted; Darrell buys his biggest locker ever.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Chatsworth auction continues into the night; Ivy takes a bite out of the competition; Darrell takes charge without Brandon; Jarrod and Brandi come up big.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders look for bargains in Inglewood, Calif.; a confident Barry rides in on his motorcycle; Jarrod and Brandi hope to trick the new buyers; Ivy spends big for a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Stanton, Calif.; Darrell is banned from an auction; Ivy Calvin lands a cool machine; Jarrod and Brandi flip for a dancer; Barry goes under cover.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod hopes that scoring more lockers will prevent Brandi from closing the store in Long Beach; Ivy attempts to intimidate the other bidders; Rene's cockiness could prove to be a detriment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi attempt to stay focused on a big score as Dave returns with more bluster than ever; Ivy's treasure promises fun on the high seas.

programme.desc: Dan and Laura face tough competition in the neighborhood of North Hollywood; Dave's locker may be a hit; Mary eyes two units that, if purchased together, would make a perfect fit.

programme.desc: The bidders head to Rancho Cucamonga, Calif.; Ivy opens his wallet for the right locker; buyers Darrell and Brandon stay hungry.
